metadata.name: AS​-​D001
metadata.description:
This artwork is part of the "INDUSTRIAL JP ASMR" series.

INDUSTRIAL JP ASMR is a project to create an archive of the sounds produced by factories and machines, recorded at various factories throughout Japan. The visual is an example of the type of field recordings generated from factory sounds for your enjoyment.

About the AS​-​D001:

This sound was recorded at Asai Seisakusyo using various microphones such as directional microphones and ambisonic microphones.

About the factory:

Asai Seisakusyo
Asai is a screw factory in the town of Soka, Saitama Prefecture. It churns out 400,000 screws a day, from standard style to slim-head. They operate their own website (nejikouba.com), and can accommodate small custom orders. And in their “Screw Studio,” they sell fashion accessories made of real screws.
